item.description:
Cost: $10/$15 per person
Club Rentals: - $8.00

Hello Everyone -

Looks like we're down to the last couple of weeks playing after work as it's getting dark so much sooner ;-( Upon your "yes" RSVP please let me know what time you can get to the course and I'll send out an email prior letting everyone know the T off time and what group you're in. Some can make it at 5:30 and others closer to 6:00 so just let me know as we typically have 3-4 T times scheduled.

Thanks and hope to see you there!!

Note:

Please check your email that afternoon for any cancellation from me.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Golf Anyone - 9 Holes!!! - MOVED PLACE TO STRAWBERRY VALLEY
